content.intro: I'm a student of Systems Analysis and Development at FATEC Ipiranga and have a technical background in Systems Development.
content.passion: I work as a Customer Support Engineer Intern, serving clients, investigating problems and collaborating in the development of tools that optimize our internal processes and customer experience.
content.technologies: I have experience with modern technologies like React, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot and various other development tools.
content.goal: I focus on combining technical and personal skills to deliver efficient and useful solutions to customers and the team.
